definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: i hope something will bring you to new york soon so that i can reciprocate your kindness.
sentences.chinese: 但願不久您能有機碰到紐約來，使我能答謝您的美意。

sentences.english: You must give me the chance to return your kindness when you visit here。
sentences.chinese: 您光臨我處時我定要藉機答謝您的盛情。

sentences.english: A few days later, the angel came back to thank the sheepherder and asked what he wanted.
sentences.chinese: 過了幾天，天使來答謝牧羊人，問他要什麼。

sentences.english: Han nation's thanks songs in Hehuang is a set of formula features distinctive wedding ceremony songs.
sentences.chinese: 河湟漢族答謝歌是一組程式化特徵鮮明的婚禮儀式歌。

sentences.english: Such was her thanks for saving him.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他對她救命之恩的答謝。

sentences.english: I hope something will bring you to New York soon so that I can reciprocate your kindness.
sentences.chinese: 希望不久您能有機會到紐約來，使我能答謝您的盛情。

sentences.english: The cats thanked people for feeding them by making a purring sound.
sentences.chinese: 貓以它們滿足的咕嚕聲答謝人們的飼養。

sentences.english: I have the pleasure in replying to your gracious speech of welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我非常愉快的答謝您熱情洋溢的歡迎詞。

sentences.english: Lizzy treats her a soda as a thank you.
sentences.chinese: 麗滋爲了答謝她，給菲比買了一聽汽水。

sentences.english: In appreciation of the enthusiastic applause, the vocalist sang an encore.
sentences.chinese: 爲了答謝熱情的掌聲，那個歌唱家又唱了一曲。
我準備了剛好45秒的答謝辭。

sentences.english: The ovation got even louder when Wang doffed his cap in appreciation, in a rare display of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 當小民脫帽致意答謝時，滿場的掌聲甚至更加熱烈。

sentences.english: Now, let's talk about the reciprocal reception.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們來討論一下答謝宴會一事。

sentences.english: After the death of jian-xun lu JiTie mouth again to visit her family to show his appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 陸建勳死後，齊鐵嘴再次拜訪霍家以示答謝。

sentences.english: In thankfulness of the enthusiastic requestlause the vocingist sang an encore.
sentences.chinese: 爲了答謝熱心的掌聲，那個歌唱家又唱了一曲。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, new menu are constantly developed to cater to the clientele.
sentences.chinese: 爲答謝廣大忠誠顧客，美食品種更在不斷地推陳出新。

definition: to send/to give as a present
to be present/to be on the scene
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
